(i)        No <<power generation/water shall pass through the XXX/abstraction shall take place>> until the Licence Holder has been granted approval by the Agency for installation at the <<weir/mill>> of a fish pass <<and approval for installation of an eel/elver pass>>.

(ii)        The Licence Holder shall maintain, repair or replace the fish <<pass>> <<and eel passes>> and ensure that <<it/they>> remain free of obstruction in order that <<it is/they are>> effective at all times.

(iii)        The Licence Holder shall keep records of maintenance, repair or replacement of the fish pass << and eel pass>> for 6 years and shall make them available during all reasonable hours for inspection by the Agency
